halo 5 guardians is the newest game the
Halo franchise a long-running franchise
is almost 20 years old at this point
this year the big sell point if you will
for the game story is that the Master
Chief the protagonist is being chased by
another Spartan this guy agent luck it's
being at least told to people that this
is an adversarial relationship that
they're going against each other I'm
here to tell you that's all false
surprise that is maybe not a huge
surprise considering they're on the same
side considering that Master Chief have
been a protagonist for the duration of
the franchise but that is all false
playing through halo 5 guardians there's
some issues with the story there's some
issues with the dialogue all of that
aside it's very important that you know
that agent Locke and the Master Chief
are not actually going after each other
and that's all kind of fabricated by
marketing and it doesn't really match up
with any of the game itself you'll play
as the master chief you'll play as agent
Locke they're super soldiers wearing
super sweet metal armor that allows them
to jump real high and regardless agent
Locke is ostensibly on Master Chief side
the whole time and it's really strange
that there's this long-running campaign
based around whether or not you are team
lock or team chief considering you're
basically on one team regardless there
is a common enemy you will face him many
many times there is another bigger
problem that you will discover at some
point but the important thing to know is
that if you were playing halo 5 chord
you don't have to choose a team you were
